pxchat.net
Interface WhiteboardClientListener

public interface WhiteboardClientListener

Together with the ClientListener, this interface controls the information flow between the network package, i.e. the Client, and the GUI components, especially the whiteboard.

Author:
Markus DÃ¶llinger, Markus Holtermann
